seascape models

Welcome to the page of the Seascape Models group at Griffith University, led by Dr Chris Brown. We use quantitative tools to help data inform more effective environmental decisions in the oceans. We do this by bringing ecological complexity to planning tools.

We are currently applying ecosystem modelling and statistics to measure the impacts of multiple stressors on marine ecosystems, inform conservation of coastal wetlands and improve monitoring of tuna fisheries.

PhD projects on marine conservation and ecosystem modelling available

our research

Ecosystem conservation, fisheries, climate change and modelling
